257.title: Ben Hur (Dramatic Reading)
257.description: Three men meet mysteriously in the desert, all led by a mysterious voice. Years later, a young Jewish man seeking revenge finds himself face to face with the King who is to come. (summary to be revised before cataloging) - Summary by Adele de Pignerolles
